Question
========

The number of ecs obtained by economics students during the first three years of their studies is normally distributed with mean 130 and standard deviation 20. Student Sandra B. earned 170 ecs. What percentage of students obtained fewer ecs than Sandra?

Answerlist
----------

* 76%
* 87%
* 98%

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 76%: Incorrect
* 87%: Incorrect
* 98%: Correct
